title: In game screen issue
body:
I have and in game screen issue. Not sure how to fix it. Could use some advice.  

The screen has the minimize, the enlarge or shrink and exit tabs on top. It made it lower the screen so its not a fit and cuts my bottom off a bit. I used the ALT-Tab key to get in and out of the screen and one day it just went haywire.

replies.body:
Hmm.. Perhaps hopping into your **VIDEO** settings in-game and changing your *windowed mode* to **Full Screen** can resolve this.

Let me know if this helped.
